languages.text: "Если того требует закон Империума, так мы и поступим".

traits.locale_text: "Если того требует закон Империума, так мы и поступим".

languages.text: "If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."
languages.original_text: "Если того требует закон Империума, так мы и поступим".

traits.locale_text: "If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."
"If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."
"If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."
"If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."

languages.text: “既然帝国的法律是这么要求的，那我们就遵守吧。”
languages.original_text: "If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."

traits.locale_text: “既然帝国的法律是这么要求的，那我们就遵守吧。”

languages.text: «Si eso es lo que requiere la ley del Imperium, eso es lo que haremos».
languages.original_text: "If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."

traits.locale_text: «Si eso es lo que requiere la ley del Imperium, eso es lo que haremos».

languages.text: 「それが帝国法なのであれば、従うとしよう」
languages.original_text: "If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."

traits.locale_text: 「それが帝国法なのであれば、従うとしよう」

languages.text: « Puisque la loi de l'Imperium l'exige, nous la respecterons. »
languages.original_text: "If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque la loi de l'Imperium l'exige, nous la respecterons. »

languages.text: "Wenn das Gesetz des Imperiums es erfordert, werden wir dem nachkommen."
languages.original_text: "If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das Gesetz des Imperiums es erfordert, werden wir dem nachkommen."

languages.text: "Madem İmparatorluk kanunları bunu gerektiriyor, o hâlde öyle yapacağız."
languages.original_text: "If that is what the law of the Imperium requires, then that is what we shall do."

traits.locale_text: "Madem İmparatorluk kanunları bunu gerektiriyor, o hâlde öyle yapacağız."
